title: Job Application Form
description: Apply for a position within our organization

intro.title: Job Application
intro.description: Thank you for your interest in joining our team. Please complete all required fields in this application form. Your information will be kept confidential and used only for the hiring process.

full_name.title: Full Name
full_name.description: Please enter your full legal name

address.title: Address
address.placeholder: Street address, City, State, Zip Code

position_applied.title: Position Applied For
position_applied.description: Please select the position you are applying for

other_position.title: Other Position
other_position.description: If you selected 'Other', please specify the position

employment_type.title: Employment Type
employment_type.description: Please select your preferred employment type

start_date.title: Available Start Date
start_date.description: When would you be available to start?

education.title: Education
education.description: Please provide details about your highest level of education

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description: Please provide details about your relevant work experience

skills.title: Skills
skills.placeholder: Technical skills, soft skills, certifications, etc.

resume.title: Resume/CV
resume.description: Please upload your resume or CV (PDF, DOC, or DOCX format, max 5MB)

cover_letter.title: Cover Letter
cover_letter.description: Please upload your cover letter (PDF, DOC, or DOCX format, max 5MB)

interest_reason.title: Why are you interested in this position?
interest_reason.description: Please explain why you are interested in this position and why you would be a good fit

referral_source.title: How did you hear about this position?
referral_source.description: Please select how you heard about this job opening

referral_name.title: Referral Name
referral_name.description: If you were referred by an employee, please provide their name

additional_info.title: Additional Information
additional_info.description: Is there anything else you would like us to know?

legal_work_status.title: Legal Work Status
legal_work_status.description: I am legally authorized to work in the country where this position is located

background_check.title: Background Check
background_check.description: I understand that employment may be contingent upon successful completion of a background check

information_certification.title: Information Certification
information_certification.description: I certify that all information provided in this application is true and complete to the best of my knowledge

submit_message.title: Submit Application
submit_message.description: Please review your application before submitting. Once submitted, you will receive a confirmation email with further instructions.
